boardgame.description: In Viticulture, the players find themselves in the roles of people in rustic, pre-modern Tuscany who have inherited meager vineyards. They have a few plots of land, an old crushpad, a tiny cellar, and three workers. They each have a dream of being the first to call their winery a true success._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players are in the position of determining how they want to allocate their workers throughout the year. Every season is different on a vineyard, so the workers have different tasks they can take care of in the summer and winter. There's competition over those tasks, and often the first worker to get to the job has an advantage over subsequent workers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fortunately for the players, people love to visit wineries, and it just so happens that many of those visitors are willing to help out around the vineyard when they visit as long as you assign a worker to take care of them. Their visits (in the form of cards) are brief but can be very helpful._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Using those workers and visitors, players can expand their vineyards by building structures, planting vines (vine cards), and filling wine orders (wine order cards). Players work towards the goal of running the most successful winery in Tuscany._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Viticulture - Essential Edition comes with components for Viticulture, but adds some of the expansions from Tuscany, including 36 Mama _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Papa cards, Field cards (previously known as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Properties_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;), expanded/revised Visitors, and 24 Automa cards (solo variant), along with a couple of minor rule changes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Card Totals_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Viticulture Essential Edition contains 154 cards at the 44 x 67 mm size and 88 cards at the 63 x 88 mm size._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Played exactly ONCE! I wanted to like it, I think this is THE EDITION to own (i first ever played Viticulture original, then a friend bought Tuscany (way too much stuff)) and I pre-ordered this... and I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t shake the feeling that I won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t play it enough. My friends that I thought would love it didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t enough, so now I realize it is best it find a good home. Game fits in a USPS Priority Mail Medium Flate Rate. Buyer pays shipping. FREE PICKUP in the BOSTON AREA.

STONEMAIER GAMES (STM105) Viticulture is a 2-6 player game that takes 45-90 minutes to play. In the game, you find yourself in rustic, pre-modern Tuscany, where you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve inherited a meager vineyard. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have a few plots of land, an old crush pad, a tiny cellar, 3 workers...and the dream of owning the best winery in Italy. Your job is to allocate your workers and helpful visitors to complete various tasks throughout the year. Each season is different on a vineyard, so the workers have different tasks they can take care of in the summer and winter. There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s competition over those tasks, and often the first worker to arrive at each one has an advantage over the rest. Using those workers and visitors, you can expand your vineyard by building structures, planting vines, and filling wine orders as you work towards the goal of owning the most successful winery in Tuscany. The Essential Edition includes the second edition of Viticulture along with several elements from the original Tuscany expansion pack, hand-picked by famed designer Uwe Rosenberg.
Like new, includes metal coin upgrade pack. Buyer pays shipping - $13.50.

This item is posted as a part of the WargameHQ Shelf Clearing Auction. The item listed is only for purchase by: Lordelrond The price has been set at the winning bid, or Buy It Now, price posted to the auction item comment page. If you won multiple items, please be sure to add them all to your cart at once and then check out so I can include them in your shipping estimate. As a reminder: I will only ship to the addresses within the United States. I only accept PayPal and payment details will be sent alongside your final invoice. Your item(s) will ship on the Saturday FOLLOWING verified payment. I will provide tracking information for your item and insurance sufficient to cover the final price of the auction on shipped items. Please inspect your items within the first 5 business days of receipt, beyond that I cannot assist with disputes. I also make no guarantees implied or otherwise as to the condition of games if the carrier has been rough with shipping. I pack games in peanuts and try to ensure both the games and their contents are secured inside the boxes to minimize issues. If you fail to pay for your item within 5 business days, I will cancel the sale and list the item on eBay and you can re-bid on it there at that time. If you have any special requests, please Geekmail me so we can discuss prior to payment finalization. Thank you for your purchase and I hope you enjoy your new game(s)!
